events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking status hasn't updated for several days now.
The customer's complaint about delayed delivery has been categorized under Delivery Delay cluster for further handling.
Support agent Anna has been assigned to handle the customer's reported issue regarding the order delay.
Hello! My name is Anna. I'm here to help with the delay in your shipment. Let's see what we can do to get this sorted.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you received so I can check the shipment status more accurately?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The tracking number is TRK987654321, but the last update was a week ago showing 'in transit'.
Thank you for that info. I've contacted the courier and requested an urgent status update. Meanwhile, if the package doesn't arrive within 3 more days, we can arrange a replacement or refund.
That sounds good, thank you. I appreciate you looking into this quickly and offering a solution if it doesn't arrive soon.
Your package has been located and should arrive tomorrow. Please check and let us know if it doesn't. We're glad to have helped resolve the delay.
Just following up to confirm you received your package and that everything is satisfactory. Please contact us if anything else is needed.
Since your package was delivered and no further issues were reported, this case is now closed. Thank you for your patience throughout the process.
